title: How do eBook apps earn money? - Quora

response.answer_text: Choose a popular topic for your eBook. ...Write your eBook to a high standard. ...Choose the best-value publishing platform for you. ...Develop a marketing strategy for your eBook. ...Enter your eBook into writing competitions. ...Publish a series of eBooks.
